discussion_comments.comment_body: We've been trying to limit direct color usage in our styles. You can take a look at `_colors.scss`, there are some `dynamic-` colors that change automatically when the theme is switched. Ultimately, it would be great, if you could reuse the colors from the existing palette, but feel free to add new ones if you need them.

Thanks, I appreciate your efforts for converting the colors!

That being said, I don't think you need this dark theme mixin. From what I've checked, the stylesheet completely relies on dynamic colors* which alter themselves during theme change, so you don't really need to do it yourself (e.g. `--color-text` variable gets automatically updated from black to white and vice versa when you switch the theme). 

The `theme.dark-theme` and `theme.light-theme` mixins are generally for special cases.

_* All colors in `_light-colors` and `_dark-colors` mixins in `_colors.scss`._
